Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model

Class Deck<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.Deck<T>
Type Parameters:
T - could be: resource,gold or aim
public class Deck<T> extends Object
This class represents the deck of the commonBoard

    • Deck

      public Deck(List<T> cardList)
      Constructor method for Deck class Requirements : cardList cannot be null
      Parameters:
      cardList - List of cards of the type of the Deck to initialize a deck

  • Method Details

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      This method checks if the deck is empty
      Returns:
      true in case the deck is empty, false otherwise

    • pickFromTop

      public T pickFromTop()
      This method gets the first element of the Deck and removes it Requirements: deck cannot be null or empty
      Returns:
      the first element of the Deck

    • appendToBottom

      public void appendToBottom(T cardToAppend)
      This method adds the element at the bottom of the Deck Requirements: cardToAppend cannot be null, deck can be empty but not null
      Parameters:
      cardToAppend - is the element to add at the bottom of the Deck

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      This method performs a shuffle on the deck Requirements: cards cannot be null or empty

    • size

      public int size()
      This method calculate the size of the deck Requirements: cards cannot be null or empty
      Returns:
      the number of cards in the deck

    • peekFirstCard

      public int peekFirstCard()
      This method allows the caller to peek the first element of the cards deck in order to get the cardID
      Returns:
      cardID of the first element of the cards deck as int

    • addToTop

      public void addToTop(T elementToAdd)
      This method allows the caller to insert an element on the top of the cards deck. It becomes very useful in the First Round when the Client has to choose one of two Cards
      Parameters:
      elementToAdd - is the element to add on top of the cards deck
